caption: Went in for the first time on a rainy Sunday night. Had a 7:30 reservation.  Ordered the calamari to start.  Rather tasty.  Ordered two pounds of snow crab legs in the garlic butter!  Let me tell you these were the prettiest and most delicious legs I’ve had in a minute! Date ordered the NY strip steak with garlic noodles and broccoli!  Another win. Would definitely go again and explore other menu options.
Went there last week for my birthday and it was iconic!! I loved it

We went here last night for the first time and was not disappointed. The parking wasn't too bad as we pulled up to the spot. There was no wait time, we were seated as we walked in. Our waiter Justin was friendly and attentive. There is only one bathroom with one toilet for men and woman,  just putting that out there. The food was awesome, we started with a couple appetizers and i must say the crab cakes are amazing and full of meat. The shrimp were juicy and big. The snow crab legs and lobster was on point as well. The prices weren't too bad for a seafood restaurant in the city. If your on the fence about visiting. Do it.
Good food and good prices
Good food good prices
Good food at a good price. The cocktails were very good.

I walked in randomly after having a craving for seafood. The service was great immediately. Everyone was warm and so kind! I was pleasantly surprised. I only ordered a few appetizers but I’ll definitely return for the warm and friendly service and the food.

Jamie is the best server ever! We asked for a great view for our one year anniversary and not only did this place accommodate our request for a great view, but Jamie gave us a fantastic experience. We are so thankful for our interactions with Jamie and when we come back (from the east coast) we will request Jamie again!
Food not as good as it looks anything fried from there isn’t put together well and the delivery guy had a bad attitude
Food is great service is excellent.
Service was excellent. I would definitely recommend this restaurant for seafood boil.

Fantastic, one-of-a-kind restaurant for which there's nothing like it in the upper west side. I love their signature Boilery sauce for their seafood boil (we tend to get the shrimp but there are so many choices)! So many options for our young kids also. We have been ordering delivery/take-out and hope to return sometime to indoor dining (and enjoy their great cocktail menu).  In the meantime, it's a GREAT restaurant for take-out. The staff were always so friendly when we did dine-in before the pandemic. Hope many more people try The Boilery!
Amazing seafood at a reasonable price. One of my favorite seafood dinners.

Officially one of my favorite restaurants in the city! Boilery Seafood and Grill was absolutely amazing, the best waiter I've ever had. He was very attentive, gave us great recommendations, and was very friendly! Will definitely be back!!!
Delicious Bloody Mary and hearty clam chowder! The service was great, too. We'll definitely be back the next time we visit NY.

Yummy! I know this place is super touristy but it's still totally worth they hype. They have really yummy clam chowder. Food portions are pretty big and a lot of wine choices. Really nice inside as well, great place for a family dinner.
(Translated by Google) Exquisite food and very friendly attention.  (Original) Comida exquisita y la atención muy amable.
Excellent food... chunky snow crab and big shrimp soaked in amazing sauce. We will return soon.
Superb service and food! I had a great time with my friends!

This is a lovely casual spot on Amsterdam  Ave. with delicious, fresh, seafood.  The shrimp po-boy was great.  Perfectly fried shrimp, fresh crispy lettuce and sweet tomatoes.  The bread was lightly toasted so that the outside was slightly crusty but the inside is soft.  The shrimp was lightly breaded and well seasoned.  I had it with their cole slaw, that was mayo based and yummy.   My husband had the fried catfish, which was also perfectly seasoned and fried.  I also had the lichee martini, Excellent!

Simply the best lobster tail and snow crab pot I've ever had especially with the kielbasa sausage. The rice cakes are an absolutely delicious and filling touch and may even steal the show.  Usually crab can be difficult to eat without the tools, but these were relatively soft and the crab came right out. Surprisingly warm and fresh for delivery. Would highly recommend!
Fantastic food even when delivered. Multiple entrees and all were exceptional. Thank you!
Amazing food. Large portions. Reasonable price. Good  and fast service.

Delivery, prompt and the food was absolutely fantastic. Little Necks-Shrimp-Corn-potatoes in an amazing mild/spicy House Sauce. Little Necks were tender and, per this New Englander, PERFECT! Shrimp were cooked to perfection with an exact amount of snap as I bit into them. There's not a Little Neck left but, good news is, I couldn't finish the Shrimp... They're chilling now for my breakfast. What a way to wake up!!! No muffin tomorrow (although I do love a good Blueberry muffin 🥰)...
I loved it  the service was great, even during covid .. the mixed drinks were awsome try one... will visit again ... o and the green mussles are on point.
Awesome food. Server Katie. Heather Asplund

Best snow crab legs I've had in NYC. The Boil in Waverly is a close second. The sauces that the crab legs marinate in are very flavorful, satisfyingly garlicky and the quality of the snow crab legs are very good. Also try the lobster mac and cheese!
Ima keep it real! It’s a bit price and you can tell it’s was frozen food. Kinda disappointed, wish I could a refund to be honest!

Making their way back due to COVID-19. Limited bar options, reluctant to open indoors despite 25% occupancy which could be a good thing due to adequate sidewalk and street side arrangement. In the past the crab boil is what you want. Let’s see how this plays out.
Awful place. Terrible service and food.
The food was fantastic!🤗
(Translated by Google) My good taste and recommended  (Original) My buen sabor y recomendable

😋🥰 absolutely in love. King attended to us awesome, friendly and attentive! Garlic butter sauce amazing 🤤 👍🏽 Highly recommend you come and try. Surf & Turf yummy tasty steak and the trio combo to die for.
My Daughter and I Love This place,the Food,the Drinks and the Staff...Very Comfortable and the Music is Awesome!!!!!

I feel bad about not leaving a tip. I am glad that you all are open again. I will be back soon. I was distracted by so many homeless over their, but that is a political problem not a business one. Plus, I want you try a drink. Stay safe
Enjoyed the po boy (shrimp)
great food and service, and the prices are more then fair.I highly recommend this restaurant.
Food was good.
Affordable. Great place for a couple.
The sea food quality was very good, the mac & cheese was amazing the best I have no pictures because I was too hungry to take them lol
LOVE THIS PLACE! Service is always pleasant and nice! And food is fresh and yummy!
The service was great, the food was delicious and the drunks were strong. I have no complaints.
The food  was amazing  the food is not expensive amazing flavor and portion you will be  full and happy when your done

Been twice already.  Shared a 5lb boil first visit, king/queen boil second visit. Wife had fried combo.   Had garlic butter sauce on both boils.  Well prepared food.  Only little complaint is second visit butter garlic had hella garlic in it that was a bit overwhelming.  Next time will get on side to dip, not have whole boil soaked in it.  Was still good.   4.5 stars.

Couldn't give a honest rating as I just went in once for a quick lunch, but the drinks were really good but the tacos were extremely small for the price with each having literally one small piece of fish it in. I'll circle back when I try their other seafood dishes.
A beautiful place for Cajun delights. Nice staff too.
Real good Louisiana sauce for lobster tail!
I tried this place already with my friend and I am hooked ever since. I enjoyed the awesome mood and delightful food and beverages. Great work.
The Boil in NYC!!!
They have amazing sweet chili wings

The anticipation of the Boilery opening did not disappoint. The Boilery Signature boil broth is full of tantalizing flavor and savory texture. We saved our appetites all day to indugle at The Boilery. We started with the perfectly seasoned and lightly crips Fried Oysters & Fried Calamari.  For the main course we ordered the Fishermen Combo and was instantly  hypnotized by the juicy and mouthwatering Snow Crabs, Shrimp(with the heads off) and succulent Cajun Kielbasa Sausage, Corn on the Cob, Cajun Potato, & Dumpling. The staff's attention to detail was impeccable, alongside their welcoming disposition. The Boilery is a welcome addition to the Upper Westside. Try it out you will not regret it! You're welcome in advance!

I love seafood and the boilery always has a fresh catch. The service is amazing!!! Brandon is very knowledgeable and makes great suggestions on the menu, the drinks make all the taste buds in your mouth dance. The food is so full of flavor ...I did mention it’s fresh!!! I’ve tried other boil spots but they aren’t even worthy of the mention as The Boilery is #1!!! The location is perfect, never a long wait, amazing service, beautiful ambiance. The music played are timeless and classic hits, and the food and drinks are top quality!! The owner Alex he is very pleasant and personable!!!!

It was great to have a seafood boil place uptown when we are in the hood.  We started with the Mai Tai for cocktails. While we are not a fan of fruity, sweet cocktails, this was really good and not sweet, and was highly recommended by the waiter. We had another round. For app, we just had the grilled oysters that were cooked perfectly.  We then had the Signature Boilery Trio and an order of crawfish.  Nice size shrimps.  We found the seafood to be very fresh.  They came with the standard potato and corn, but also with rice cake which we really enjoyed.  We have been to a few boil places in the city and think this is one of the best.
Expensive and good sea food and very nice people.
Cute place. The food was seasoned okay,  not over done. The crowd wasn't loud and the music in the background wasn't loud. You can actually hold a conversation in there.

Today was my first day going to the boilery. The two stars is basically for the customer service. I would have given 5 stars but unfortunately I cant separate the ratings for each service. The food was not worth $165.00. I had snow crabs with shrimps(44), snow crags(29), 3 drinks, dozen of raw clams, and sausage. The boilery signature sauce was not tasty, it was too watery. It seems as if the pour the sauce ontop of the seafood instead of letting it marinate. Its a nice place to dine with a significant other. The drinks were average, tasty, but not strong. They do not give alot of sausages. The gratuity is not included. The staff were extremely courteous. However, today was my first and last time going there. The boil on waverly street is better and cheaper.
The customer service is consistently rapid, good vibes, very nice staff members. Will visit again when I get in the area.
Lovely decor great seafood with an Asian flair
The food was good as well as the atmosphere music I will definitely be back.

(Translated by Google) Very appetizing menu, excellent products, attentive and very friendly service. We ate very well whether it was seafood platter or mac & cheese dishes with lobster everything was superbly done. The cocktails were all good. Recommended for a nice dinner or lunch by the sea  (Original) Carte très appétissante, produits excellents, service attentif et très aimable. Nous avons très bien mangé que ce soit fruits de mer en plateau ou plats de mac&cheese avec du homard tout était superbement fait. Les cocktails étaient tous bons. Recommandé pour un agréable dîner ou déjeuner de la mer

Decent prices and great food, I usually order 1/2 lb of crab at other spots not knowing if I’ll enjoy the food or not but I decided to order 1 lb of crab and I was so surprised by how much I liked it. The wine selection is great as well, thanks for the amazing food and great service !
Great seafood, happy hour appetizers and drinks oh my!
Had the NY steak and turf and it was delicious!
The food was delicious, the music was really good and the staff were really nice.

I just love The Boilery! It is new to my Upper West Side neighborhood, but I've already been there 5 times with guests. The food is first-class if you love seafood, as is the service, and the music is awesome -- oldies but goodies! I recommend it highly.
Fantastic cocktails! Really good bar area and bartender. Melissa really knew her stuff. Can't wait to try the food.
The seafood is great both in taste and quantity.  The servers are personable and the service is fast.

Do not ever and I mean EVER eat from this establishment again! I ordered shrimp and corn which I eat on the regular and my WHOLE entire body broke out in hives!!! I can’t believe this happend to me after eating here for the first time! I’m sitting here so baffled in the emergency room because they’re saying it’s a food allergy and all I ate was shrimp. There something in this food that isn’t right at all! Beware
Very nice lunch special of shrimp and clams in spicy cajun. Be sure to get a side of garlic bread to soak up the delicious sauce. Very friendly staff / owner (alex). Will return!
Fun place to wear a bib and crack some crab legs. Oysters were fresh, food was overall good and service was great. Some great happy hour deals as well.
Monday night is lobster night. All three of us had broiled lobsters with Thai seasonings. They all like them. We also had oysters and clams on the half shell at happy hour prices.
It had really good and would serve you by the pound. Although they seem to be a bit expensive, its worth it. They are brand new. I got the fried shrimp with fries. Filled me up completely.

This is definitely a hidden gem. The place is new. We had a pound each of the shrimp, crawfish and little neck clams with their signature sauce. I think the taste is great at the spicy level. The waiter was attentive. The hostess very friendly and accommodating. Give it a try before it gets really busy.
The food is great but the service needs to be addressed- before you put your fork down the waiter is grabbing your plate
The best Seafood restaurant in the UWS. Excellent food, excellent service, and cozy atmosphere make it a great experience every time! 100% recommended ❤
The broiled salmon is outstanding.  The service was adequate not as good as the food. Fantastic wine and atmosphere.  The red velvet cake was absolutely delicious.
There's a bartender name KING. He's super dope!
Amazing food and great service!
Nice and cozy hang out spot and the food is great!
The food is good
Amazing food and amazing service. The seafood was fresh and delicious.We ordered the signature sauce for the seafood combo. The flavor is perfect.
delicious
The staff and owner are the best. Please it's a must go to place. Love the staff 4ever.

I went there during lunch time (2pm) and we had the option of seating ourselves.  I order the snow crabs legs, which is steamed with my choice of garlic and butter. I also ordered Fried calamari... Both were yummy! Our waitress was awesome as well.  Great first time experience at the Boiley. Definitely will be back.  😋
New place for seafood clean N fresh fish!

I took my daughter here for her birthday and it was fantastic. The food, service and decor was spot on; try the rum punch. We had the lobster mac and cheese,  fish tacos and crab legs and it was de-freaking-licous; nice job folks - I shall return.
This place is tiny and tidy. good food. hostess is pretty and sweet. my server was very helpful, came to check up on me.

This place is whst this area was missing a seafood  place. This place look  so beautiful and clean. Me and my husband  had a good time and  all the waiters seemed young and vibrant. and our waitor we  had was from Mongolia he was so attentive and fun to talk too. Our food was so delicious  shrimp and snow crabs was awesome.Wednesday a bottle of wine is 25% off. Our bill wad so resonable  we will make this place our favorite  spot to hang out
Rockin Food Super Fresh Great Portions
Great staff! Great food! Perfect drinks!

the food was great went with my wife granted the lighting could’ve been a little brighter but overall it was good ,their signature sauce was amazing and really really tasty we had the grilled oysters which were really fantastic i had the catch of the day plate which was shrimp with the shell on with the boilery signature sauce mild , my wife had the snow crab legs with shrimp all of it grilled over all a great place to eat would definitely recommend it
Very nice staff. Had a comprehensive set of lunch specials. However, neither the Lobster Roll, nor the Oyster Po Boy were memorable.
Me and my boyfriend came her for dinner this Tuesday, the food and service was excellent. Will be coming here more often!
I opted for shrimp with potatoes, sausages and rice cakes. My potatoes weren’t as soft as I like but the shrimp and sausages were cooked to perfection. My food was full of flavor.
Great for filling seafood prices are reasonable but the portion size.
good to have this place take over the previous Chinese restaurant. good seafood.
The food as always was on point!! The service Was good and the menu has continue to evolve.
The food is very flavorful
Great new sexy seafood joint. Alex the bartender was super cool. Bar food, bar selection and ambiance all great.
The food was good.
If you want frozen fried food you can get it from the super market and save $$$$. Happy hour $ 8 for 5 ounces of wine that is not premium ?????
Nice place
I was so amazed by the food. Not only was the taste on point, but the temperature was on point. I would definitely revisit as this was my first time. The rum punch was delicious.
Food was good, and the ambiance
The food was excellent....

I do hope that boilery. Will be an amazing and added source of great grill and seafood.  Not since Village lobster,  has there been a place where you can enjoy fresh seafood platter and lobster, salads  , mac and cheese, and real shrimps and crabs. Your spot on 3rd Avenue and 11street should be able to celebrate what has been missing in this area
Low lights not noisy

This was my first time dining at Boilery. My waiter was great. I ordered the Scallop & Shrimp boil it was good. I really liked the signature sauce. Nice & Garlicky.  I wished they would of took the shell off the shrimp. Beware the bathroom was dirty.
Good food selection. Huge fan of the lobster mac and cheese. Little pricey but not out of the ordinary in location.

The steamed seafood main courses are as good as any seafood in the City. Huge portions of super-fresh crab legs, crawfish, shrimp and lobster. Very reasonable prices, as well. They need to work on their service, which is slow, and they claimed to be "out of their happy hour oysters" when we got there at 5:30pm, which was annoying and petty, but if they can iron out those kinks, this place can be an iconic seafood destination in NYC.
Great, great, great! Will be back!
From the Intrerior to the service and the food everything is amazing.
The boilery is excellent, food and service is top notch. I won't have to go to the lower East Side to the Boil any more. The UWS has its own.
Signature  sauce with King Crab was great! Garlic noodles was an excellent  complement.
Great seafood and a fun experience
Funky, but fun with good food and great drinks
Nice food
I love this yummy restaraunt. The food is fresh and phenomenal
The texture of my shrimp was quite off...  too mushy for my taste for grilled shrimp...  the flavor of the boil was good but nothing about this place really stood out.  Probably wont return
The staff and owner were extremely nice and accommodating, and the food and drinks were amazing
Nice atmosphere. & staff. Food tasty
The food was nice and hot.  Service was a bit slow.  It's a new restaurant so I guess that the Staff has to settle down I would go back and encourage others to try it.  It's a bit pricey

Vacationing from California and took a chance on this new little spot based on the positive reviews already shared. We were not disappointed, the food was amazing. Great prices, portions and staff. Would definitely come again next time in the area.
Very fun place for a group
Fresh. Prepared and or cooled properly. They go the extra mile.
Great customer service and food!
I loved the food. Lobster tail, a delicious
Great service
Just great seafood, happy hour's filled with awesomesauce!!!
quality seafood, def worth a visit!
The food was delicious! No wait time!
Impressed!
The food was delicious, prices and service was good. My second time visiting
Awesome food, Awesome Staff, I have a shellfish allergy and all the fish dishes and steak were amazing. Especially the thai chili whole fish.

Food: Incredible! My favorites were the Crispy Cod and the whole fish, they were both delicious!  Service: Excellent from the warm greeting at the door to the server to the manager. The manager stopped by the table and made sure everything was fine and that we were having a good experience.  It is a cute new place in the UWS has seating in street level and also downstairs. It is great for the summer because they have the big windows that open making it a great place to hang out and have good food.  Overall, I am impressed by the quality of food & service.  Can’t wait to go back!
Great place
Amazing place very satisfied to eat amazing food very recommend it the catch of the day on the menu it’s excellent 🙌🏼🙌🏼
Absolutely love the seafood selection... most try out the place

Went there yesterday at night I ask fr hot water  in a cup the guy told me they didn’t hve hot water.. No liquor or wine only beer don’t drink beer..Once we left by 10 something I went home.Didn't feel good throw up 5 times (out my nose n mouth) n diarrhea... until 5 this morning..Was not happy at all with that.. The people in there was very nice so I give it 2 stars..
Place just opened but gave it a shot, very awesome snow crab boil, had 1lb with house seasoning.. amazing..
It's great to have a seafood restaurant in the neighborhood. Delicious food and friendly service.
Very professional and friendly staffs!  A great restaurant  to dine with your family and friends, a place filled with delicious foods. I highly recommend this place!
We will be back! We enjoyed the calamari, wedge salad, fish tacos, and crispy cod with Cajun waffle fries and are excited to try more! Great portions and service too.

A great experience. Freshest seafood I've had in a while. Definitely a great addition to the neighborhood. Also thanks to the Westside rag for pointing us in this direction, they were right about the shrimp cocktail!
We were so excited about a new spot, but the food was worse than ballpark food and the wait staff seemed clueless. Don’t waste your money here unless you’re craving fried food out of of bag.
